invariants_acknowledged: Modular Architecture - All AI components follow hexagonal architecture with clear boundaries
Type Safety - All LLM inputs/outputs use Zod schemas for validation
Cost Control - Every LLM invocation tracks tokens and costs with configurable limits
Human-in-the-Loop - AI outputs include confidence scores, allow human override when confidence < 0.5
Memory Persistence - Zep provides conversation memory across sessions with TTL and privacy controls
Error Resilience - All chains implement retry logic (3 attempts) with exponential backoff
Observability - Chain execution logged with correlation IDs, duration, and token usage
Provider Flexibility - Architecture supports OpenAI (production) and Ollama (local dev)
Structured Outputs - All agent responses use StructuredOutputParser for consistent results
Performance Targets - AI scoring <2s per lead (p95), batch operations with rate limiting
